2024-02-29 Serra Ardem The rise of AI video generators is inevitable now. As we write this blog in February 2024, OpenAI recently introduced Sora (not available to public use yet), a text-to-video AI model that can generate realistic videos up to a minute long. Meanwhile, the Google Research team aims to push the boundaries of AI video creation with its ongoing project Lumiere. Consider entering this growing realm? Our blog can act as your guide. We’ve listed 10 AI video generators for beginners with a particular focus on text-to-video tools. We also shared the best practices for AI video making so you can make most of these tools while using them responsibly. Let’s dig in. What is an AI video generator? An AI video generator is a software tool that leverages artificial intelligence technology to create video content from an input. The user provides a text or image, and the AI generates corresponding visuals, select appropriate music and add voiceovers. AI video generators use advanced machine learning techniques to understand and analyze visual and auditory elements. The AI model is trained on vast amounts of data so it can learn patterns, styles and even contextual nuances. Once trained, an AI video maker can generate highly realistic and tailored videos based on input. Pros and Cons of AI Video Generators While AI video generators offer numerous advantages, they also come with certain drawbacks. These tools can significantly speed up the video creation process and make the practice accessible to those who lack advanced editing skills. They also automate repetitive and tedious tasks, allowing more time for creativity. Yet AI-generated videos may lack the human touch, which is essential for building a genuine connection with an audience. They can be misused to create misleading and deceptive content with deepfake technology, a major ethical issue. Therefore, it is crucial to strike a balance between harnessing the power of AI video generators and addressing societal concerns. What’s the best AI video generator? There’s no single best AI video generator as this depends on three main factors: the content type you wish to produce, your level of expertise and your budget. AI video generators excel in different areas. Some specialize in explainer videos while others in social media content. The best tool must align with your content needs. You should also consider your level of expertise and choose a simpler tool if you have no technical background. Finally, you must take your budget into account and decide how much you can invest. Still, whatever your needs are, keep in mind that best AI video generators share certain qualities that make them loved by many. These are: User-friendliness: Is the tool’s interface easy to navigate? This will save a lot of time and reduce the learning curve, especially for those without prior experience. Speed: How quickly can the generator process your input and create a video draft? This is particularly essential for users working with tight deadlines. Compatibility: Is the AI video generator compatible with the software, devices and platforms you commonly use? A versatile tool must easily work with your existing resources and improve the overall quality. Quality of output: Are these AI-generated videos realistic and visually appealing? The tool must deliver high-quality results with accurate scene transitions, realistic animations and clear visuals. Customization: What level of control do you have over the visuals, sound and transitions? Look for a tool that allows you to tailor the output and maintain creative control. Pricing: Does the tool offer flexible pricing plans? It’s important to find a balance between features and affordability. 10 Best AI Video Generators for Beginners Now we’ve covered the key qualities to look for in an AI video generator, let’s move to our list curated for those who are entering the realm of AI video creation. In this list, we particularly focus on text-to-video AI generators and how beginners can adopt them for content creation. 1. Fliki Fliki can transform a script into a dynamic video and add lifelike AI voices in minutes. You can start by entering your text into the script box and then personalize an AI voice. Afterwards, you can select the perfect media among the tool’s assets library or let AI do its job. Finally you can review and refine your video to perfection, and proudly share it with the world. Standout feature: Magic Create, which can turn a blog post, Tweet or even an Amazon product listing into a video Free plan offers 5 minutes of credits per month. See more on pricing. 2. Visla Visla can bring your written content to life by converting a short story, article or song lyrics into a video. Just input your script and describe the video you want to create. You can set the video pace with descriptions like fast (quick cuts), medium or slow. Then you can record your own voice in-app or select an AI voice, and customize the video with the footage of your choice. Standout feature: Rewrite with AI, which generates an enhanced script based on your text Free plan offers 50 minutes/month video publish time. See more on pricing. 3. Colossyan As one of the most popular AI video generators for workplace learning, Colossyan creates professional-looking, studio-quality videos from text. The tool can be especially utilized for company or product onboarding videos. Need to change your AI-generated video? All you have to do is edit the text, and Colossyan will optimize and update the video to generate a new one. Standout feature: Brand Kit, which allows you to save your brand styles for consistency Free trial version with 5 total video minutes. See more on pricing. 4. Elai.io Chosen by major companies in the world, Elai.io lets you generate hassle-free learning and development content such as training, sales and knowledge base videos. The tool offers a wide variety of customizable digital presenters and 450+ voices. It can also clone your voice in 28 different languages. Simply record your voice: 1-5 minutes of a voice recording with no extra noise will be OK. Elai.io will clone your voice and add it to your builder in 3 business days. Standout feature: 4 types of AI avatars (selfie, studio, photo, animated mascot) that can be uniquely personalized Free plan offers 1 minute free credit. See more on pricing. 5. HeyGen A tool highly preferred by marketing professionals, HeyGen can even transform an email into an attention-grabbing video in a few simple steps. Choose one of the 200+ video templates as a starting point. Then, select the AI avatar that comes with various ethnicities, ages and poses. Finally, enter your script and HeyGen will convert text-to-speech, lip syncing it with your avatar. Standout feature: TalkingPhoto, which can turn your still image into a moving, talking one Free plan offers 1 free credit. See more on pricing. 6. DeepBrain AI Known as one of the best AI video generators for beginners, DeepBrain AI defines itself as “a platform designed for no-stress video creation.” The cool thing about this tool is that it can transform a PDF or URL into a video. You can copy and paste your PDF text or URL into the text editor, choose an AI presenter, refine the PDF script if needed and generate your video. Simple as that. Standout feature: in-editor ChatGPT integration, which can brainstorm video ideas, create scripts, check grammar and so on Starter plan, $24/month annually, offers 10 minutes/month. See more on pricing. 7. FlexClip FlexClip is one of those simple yet powerful AI video generators that does not require a learning curve. First, you can use the tool’s AI Script Generator to specify the theme or topic of your script and decide the duration of your video; short, medium or long. You will then be directed to the AI Video Editor where you can customize the script according to your preferences. FlexClip provides a vast variety of preset styles, text animations and royalty-free stock assets. Standout feature: two generation modes; AI can summarize or excerpt original content to create a video Free plan allows you to use the text-to-video AI generator 5 times per month. See more on pricing. 8. Runway Gen-2 Runway Gen-2 is one of the most well-known AI video generators that can let your creativity shine. The tool allows you to upload an image reference along with your text prompt to influence your generations. You can also upscale your video by automatically enhancing its resolution. Need to overcome that creative block? Check Gen-2’s inspiration feed below the prompt box to get new ideas and remix existing prompts. Standout feature: rate your generation to help the Runway team improve Gen-2 Free plan offers 125 credits. See more on pricing. 9. Pictory Content marketers love Pictory, and for several good reasons. Enter your blog post’s URL and Pictory’s AI engine will automatically select the best summary sentences, images and clips for your video. It will also choose background music and offer a set of natural-sounding voiceovers. You can narrate the video using your own voice too. Standout feature: automatic captioning for videos, which can boost SEO performance and maximize your reach Free trial allows you to create 3 video projects, each up to 10 minutes long. See more on pricing. 10. Canva Yes, you can use Canva to generate videos from text while benefiting from the platform’s vast media library. With Canva’s Magic Media, it is possible to visualize a product or transform your photo or selfie into an AI-powered talking head. The tool lets you automatically remove the background of any video with one click. Enjoy playing around with its different stickers, graphics, fonts and color schemes to set the mood of your video. Standout feature: Canva Pro bundle, which involves a massive content library and powerful design tools like Magic Resize Canva’s Magic Media text-to-video AI generator offers 5 free lifetime uses. See more on pricing. Supportive Tools for AI Video Editing Besides these text-to-video AI generators, there are also two supportive tools you can use to streamline your video editing process. Lumen5 It’s no surprise that Lumen5 is called the “PowerPoint of video making” thanks to the tool’s user-friendly interface. Feeling stuck? Lumen’s AI Script Composer is ready to help you. You can just provide an outline and Lumen will generate multiple video scripts. Now you can pick your favorite, customize its length and tone, and make a high-quality video in minutes. Standout feature: Talking Head video creator, which can be enhanced with a lower-third, callout or cutaway Free (community) plan offers up to five videos a month. See more on pricing. Descript Descript is an all-in-one AI tool where you can write, record, storyboard, edit and collaborate in a single place. Start writing your script in the AI-powered editor or record your voice to transcribe audio. The tool can shorten gaps and remove filler words if you wish. Next you can use the properties panel on the right to add animations, make visual or audio edits and apply AI effects. Standout feature: Studio Sound, which removes background noise, room echo and other undesirable sounds Free plan offers one watermark-free video per month. See more on pricing. Best Practices for Generating Videos with AI Adopting AI video generators requires careful planning, consideration, and an ethical mindset. It’s essential to embrace AI without compromising on human creativity. Here are 7 best practices to leverage AI in the best way. Don’t lose the human touch. AI should be viewed as a tool to amplify creativity, not replace it. Guide the tools to enrich your unique ideas and add personal touches to make your video distinctive. Craft well-written prompts. The outcome of your video heavily depends on the quality of your input as AI video generators rely on them to understand what you want. Write specific prompts that articulate your desired content, style and tone. Maintain brand consistency. Whether your videos are for marketing, education or entertainment, this practice will foster brand recognition and trust. Choose an AI video generator that provides customization elements that can reflect your brand’s personality. Add subtitles to prioritize accessibility. Many AI video generators offer subtitles in various languages but remember; accuracy is paramount. You can get support from Maestra’s AI subtitle generator which has a very high accuracy rate. The tool can add auto subtitles to your video in 125+ languages and maximize your reach while staying true to your content. Review your video carefully. Creators must meticulously check the content for accuracy, coherence and alignment with the intended message. Don’t forget to fine-tune elements where needed and consider getting feedback from others before hitting that publish button. Use AI responsibly. Stay away from deepfakes or video manipulations that deliberately distort reality or misrepresent people. Be transparent about the use of AI in your video generation and address ethical concerns if they arise. Experiment, experiment, experiment. The landscape of AI is dynamic, and continuous learning is essential to keep up. Be open to exploring new AI software and their creative applications as they emerge. Frequently Asked Questions Is there a free AI video generator? Synthesia, Invideo and Kapwing are some of the AI video generators that offer free versions with limited features. Remember; trial versions can include watermarks, limit the length of generated videos or reduce access to customization options. We recommend you experiment with different tools before sticking to one. Is AI content copyright free? This is a complex matter but one thing is certain: The rules of the specific AI tool you’re using is crucial. Be cautious and don’t assume that AI-generated content is automatically copyright-free. Always make sure you understand the terms of service of the AI tools you use. Can AI generate a video from a photo? It is possible to transform photos into a video with AI technology. AI can analyze your photo, predict how elements within the photo can move and create a short video with motions by manipulating the image. It can also generate a 3D model from your photo and generate short videos by moving the camera around the object. Can AI create animation videos? Absolutely! Animaker is just one AI animation video generator that serves course creators, HR teams, marketing professionals and more. For example, you can build an AI avatar for your brand, choose from various video templates and let AI work its magic. Does ChatGPT make videos? No, ChatGPT does not directly make videos. Yet OpenAI, the research company behind ChatGPT, recently announced Sora: a text-to-video AI model that can generate videos up to a minute long. As of February 2024, Sora is in its early development stages and is not widely available to everyone. AI video generators have the power to fasten up content creation, improve accessibility and reduce video production costs if they’re used ethically and wisely. Introduction to AI Video Generation Artificial Intelligence (AI) has revolutionized the landscape of video creation, making it possible for beginners to generate high-quality videos with minimal effort and technical knowledge. AI video generation leverages advanced algorithms to automate various aspects of video production, from scripting and scene creation to voiceover and editing. This tutorial aims to demystify AI video generation for beginners by providing step-by-step guidance on how to create engaging videos using the simplest tools and techniques available. In this tutorial, we will explore the fundamental concepts of AI video generation, familiarize ourselves with essential tools and resources, and walk through the entire process of creating an AI-generated video. Let’s dive into the exciting world of AI video creation and see how it can transform your content production experience. 2. Understanding Basic Concepts and Tools in AI Video Generation To begin with AI video generation, it’s essential to understand some foundational concepts and familiarize yourself with the tools that will assist you in this creative process. Here are the key concepts and tools to get you started: Key Concepts Artificial Intelligence (AI): AI refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn. In the context of video generation, AI algorithms analyze and reproduce elements of video production, such as motion, voice, and visual effects. Machine Learning (ML): This is a subset of AI that focuses on the development of algorithms that enable computers to learn from and make predictions based on data. According to IBM, machine learning models are trained on large datasets to recognize patterns and automate complex tasks. Deep Learning: A specialized form of machine learning, deep learning utilizes neural networks with many layers (hence “deep”) to process data in complex ways. The MIT Technology Review explains how this technology is crucial for generating realistic video content. Neural Networks: These are the backbone of deep learning models. According to Stanford’s AI Lab, neural networks are designed to mimic the way human brains process information, making them highly effective in recognizing patterns and generating new content based on those patterns. Essential Tools AI Video Generation Software: There are several user-friendly AI video generation tools designed for beginners, such as PopAi, Lumen5, Magisto, and Animoto. These platforms provide templates and intuitive interfaces to streamline the video creation process. Text-to-Video Tools: Tools like PopAi AI Writing and InVideo convert text into engaging video content. These tools are particularly useful for turning blog posts, articles, or scripts into animated videos in just a few clicks. AI Presentation Tools: For those looking to create presentation-style videos, PopAi AI Presentation offers specialized features for creating professional presentations with AI assistance. Voiceover Software: AI-driven voiceover tools like WellSaid Labs and Murf AI can generate realistic voiceovers from text, providing a professional touch to your videos without needing a recording studio. Editing Suites: AI-assisted editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and Final Cut Pro X integrate AI features to automate tedious editing tasks, enhance video quality, and suggest improvements. By understanding these concepts and tools, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge necessary to start your AI video generation journey. In the next section, we will walk you through a step-by-step guide to creating your first AI-generated video. 3. Step-by-Step Guide to Creating Your First AI-Generated Video Now that we have a solid understanding of the basic concepts and tools involved in AI video generation, it’s time to put that knowledge into practice. In this section, we will guide you through a simple, step-by-step process to create your very first AI-generated video. Follow these steps closely, and you’ll have a polished video ready to share in no time. Step 1: Plan Your Video Content Before diving into the tools, it’s important to plan out the content of your video. Consider the following elements: Purpose: Determine the goal of your video. Are you trying to educate, entertain, or promote something? Audience: Identify who your target audience is. This will help shape the tone and style of your video. Message: Decide on the key message or story you want to convey. Keep it clear and concise. Script: Write a simple script or outline for your video. This will serve as a blueprint for your AI video generation process. Step 2: Select an AI Video Generation Tool Choose a beginner-friendly AI video generation tool from the options discussed earlier. For this guide, we’ll explore PopAi, a versatile AI video generation platform that offers: Text-to-video conversion capabilities Image-to-video transformation Custom text-to-image generation Flexible style and size options Easy sharing features with friends and colleagues While we’ll focus on PopAi, the principles can be applied to other tools as well. Step 3: Create a New Project Once you’ve signed up and logged in to PopAi: Choose Your Creation Type: Select whether you want to: Generate a video from text Transform existing images into videos Create custom images from text prompts Configure Your Settings: Select your preferred: Style preferences Output size and format Additional customization options Step 4: Input Your Script Using your prepared script, input the text into the tool. Lumen5 offers a simple way to do this: Copy and Paste Your Script: Paste your script into the text box provided. The tool will automatically divide your script into scenes based on natural pauses and sentence breaks. Refine Scene Text: Adjust the text for each scene to ensure it’s concise and impactful. You can edit it directly within the tool. Step 5: Choose Media Elements Next, you’ll want to choose images, video clips, and other media to accompany your text. Lumen5 provides a vast library of royalty-free media assets: Search for Media: Use the search bar to find relevant images and video clips. Keywords related to your script can help filter the results. Drag and Drop: Simply drag and drop the selected media into the corresponding scenes. The tool will help format them to fit the template. Step 6: Add Voiceover and Music To enhance your video, consider adding a voiceover and background music: Voiceover Tool: If using a text-to-speech tool like Murf AI or WellSaid Labs, input your script and generate a voiceover. Download the audio file and upload it to your video project. Background Music: Browse the provided music library within Lumen5 or upload your own music. Keep in mind the mood and tone you want to set for your audience. Step 7: Customize and Preview Make final adjustments to your video to ensure it meets your vision: Edit Scenes: Rearrange, add, or delete scenes as needed. Fine-tune the text, media, and timing for each scene. Preview: Use the preview function to watch your video. Look for any inconsistencies or areas that need improvement. Apply Effects: Add transition effects, filters, and other visual enhancements to make your video more dynamic. Step 8: Export and Share Once satisfied with your video, it’s time to export and share it: Export Settings: Choose the appropriate export settings (resolution, format, etc.) based on where you plan to share the video (e.g., social media, websites, presentations). Download: Download the finalized video file to your computer or directly link it to your social media accounts for instant sharing. By following these steps, you have created an engaging AI-generated video from scratch. Whether it’s for a personal project, marketing campaign, or educational content, AI tools make the video creation process accessible and efficient for beginners. In the next section, we will explore additional features and customization options to further enhance your AI-generated videos. 4. Exploring Features and Customization Options AI video generation tools come packed with a variety of features and customization options that can help you create unique and professional videos. In this section, we’ll delve into some of the key features available on most platforms and how you can use them to enhance your video content. Customizable Templates One of the biggest advantages of AI video generation tools is the availability of customizable templates. These templates are designed to suit different types of videos, such as promotional content, educational tutorials, social media posts, and more.
